name: Ashlea A. Morgan (Website)
description: Ashlea is a Neuroscientist, Ph.D Candidate, and Writer. This website establishes her professional brand in these areas. The site is responsive to mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

name: The Poem Club
description: 'Poem Club'. A community-driven app for wordsmiths and lovers of poetry. I am actively collaborating with web developer, Lia Kapanadze and UX Designer, Adam Lempel to build this app.

name: Gig-A-Bit
description: 'Gig-A-Bit'. The talent-board app for artistic individuals and small groups. Register and post your art, project ideas and/or portfolio to be seen by talent-seekers online.

name: Instacart-Costco
description: 'Instacart-Costco'. A re-creation of Instacart's website. Proposes a layout that enhances the navigation, personalization, flow and accessibility of the site.

name: World Tour
description: 'World Tour' allows users to take a satellite journey to both familiar and foreign lands of Earth. You can randomly teleport or get specific in your search for regional data.
